articles.author: Taylor Romine, Priya Krishnakumar and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Man faces murder as a hate crime charge after 'devastating' attack on Asian immigrant in NYC - CNN
articles.description: A man who allegedly assaulted Yao Pan Ma, a Chinese immigrant, in New York City last year has been charged with murder in the second degree as a hate crime, Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg announced Thursday.
